Monster.Name: Gladiator
Monster.Description: Gladiators battle for the entertainment of raucous crowds. Some gladiators are brutal pit fighters who treat each match as a life-or-death struggle, while others are professional duelists who command huge fees but rarely fight to the death.

MonsterTrait.Name: Brave
MonsterTrait.Text: The gladiator has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

MonsterTrait.Name: Brute
MonsterTrait.Text: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the gladiator hits with it (included in the attack).

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The gladiator makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

MonsterAction.Name: Spear
MonsterAction.Text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. and range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

MonsterAction.Name: Shield Bash
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

MonsterTrait.Name: Parry
MonsterTrait.Text: The gladiator adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the gladiator must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
